channel.title: Emotes
channel.description:
How do I make this [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/amuwya.png[/img]
Into the modern runescape emotes?

item.title: Emotes
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:3, topic:393771”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=490956.msg3590040#msg3590040 date=1304543329]
add all the interfaces (can probabbly get off a newer server) then head to client.java and link your interfaces so when you click them it sends an emote. then head to clickingbuttons.java and link them with their emotes there. Its a massive project and i recommend you dont use that blank source. Its not really worth anything you might want to use a pi or even a newer delta
[/quote]
Find me a tut?[/quote]
Look for one, search 474 Emote tab (or something like this, we shouldn’t have to spoon feed you)

Read full topic
